name: intimidate

effect.sun_moon: Does not take effect if acquired after entering battle.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Does not take effect if acquired after entering battle.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Does not take effect if acquired after entering battle.

short_effect: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The Pokémon intimidates opposing Pokémon upon entering battle, lowering their Attack stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The Pokémon intimidates opposing Pokémon upon entering battle, lowering their Attack stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The Pokémon intimidates opposing Pokémon upon entering battle, lowering their Attack stat.
